properties.address: 18 Derby Street, Preston, Lancashire PR1 1DT
properties.description: We are particularly hoping to support people who are feeling lonely and disconnected, to expand their connection with our lovely city community by offering sessions where they can develop friendships and take part in simple activities including meditative arts and crafts. No prior experience is required, these are skill-share sessions for us all to learn something simple, or to refresh and develop existing skills. Our aim is to offer our community the chance to forge new links, learn something new and maybe pick up hobbies and activities to take home with them. This is an ideal way to make new friends and we are happy to hold this weekly space for our community.
properties.title: Mandala Yoga and Well-being

properties.description: Tuesday: Coffestop@TCF 11.00am to 1.30pm- Hot drink and toast served at 11.00am. Light lunched served at 12 noon. Have a chat, do a jigsaw, play dominoes, make new friends, or just relax. Need help? We are ready to listen. Chattabox on Thursday is for parents/carers and pre school children. 10.00am to 11.30am. Craft, singing, meet other families. Small charge of £1 for 1 adult and 2 children. Extra people 50p per person. This includes a drink and biscuits for all Sunday morning service, 10.30am to 12 noon. All ages are welcome. No charge

properties.address: Brook Street, Preston PR1 7NB
properties.description: Plungington Community Café is open weekdays from 10am to 2pm, providing a warm space and affordable food and drinks. The centre also delivers a food club, providing approximately 30 food parcels a week. Please get in touch with the centre via the contact details below to find out more about this service. The centre is host to a variety of social events throughout the week and is an Official Breast Feeding Café, which holds a weekly support group. See events taking place and opening hours here: What's On - Caritas Care Adoption, Fostering and Learning Disability Services North West
properties.title: Plungington Community Centre and Cafe (Plungington, Preston)

properties.address: 49 Whitby Ave, Ingol, Preston PR2 3YP
properties.description: Intact (Ingol and Tanterton Community Trust) is an essential part of the Ingol and Tanterton community offering a range of services and activities for local residents and people in the wider community. Some of the clubs and activities they run are: Whitby’s Pantry – A community Food Club where you can get £25 worth of food for £6, along with free vegetables and bread Community Café and Warm Space Opening times for the pantry and warm space: Counselling By Appointment – Free Person-Centred Counselling with a BACP register Counsellor As well as many more clubs and activities. For more details on what's on offer please follow this link: The Centre - Intact (intact-preston.org.uk)
properties.title: Intact Centre Tanteron (Ingol)
